Name: filename
Description: name to be used when creating file

Name: modification-date
Description: date when content was last modified

Name: read-date
Description: date when content was last read

Name: size
Description: approximate size of content in octets

Name: voice
Description: type or use of audio content

Name: handling
Description: whether or not processing is required

Name: preview-type
Description: Internet media type (and parameters) of the preview output desired from a processor by the author of the MIME content
